code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Dialog,DialogTitle,DialogContent,DialogActions,TextField,Button,Box}from'@mui/material';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PriceModal(_ref){let{open,onClose,onSubmit,product}=_ref;const[price,setPrice]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const handleSubmit=()=>{onSubmit({price,description,product});setPrice('');setDescription('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dialog,{open:open,onClose:onClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogTitle,{children:["Set Price and Details for ",product===null||product===void 0?void 0:product.Product]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogContent,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:2,mt:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{autoFocus:true,label:"Price (\u20AC)",type:"number",value:price,onChange:e=>setPrice(e.target.value),inputProps:{step:"0.01"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Description (model, details, etc.)",multiline:true,rows:2,value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),placeholder:"e.g., iPhone 14 Pro Max 256GB"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,disabled:!price||!description,variant:"contained",children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});}export default PriceModal;
